SEARCH
Package songsorter.music

Class SorterPlaylist

java.lang.Object
songsorter.music.SorterPlaylist
public class SorterPlaylist extends Object
A playlist object only for the SongSorter application, separate from se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification.Playlist. Creates an object for public Spotify playlists. Enables nearest neighbour heuristic solution to TSP.

    • SorterPlaylist

      public SorterPlaylist(se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi sapi, String url) throws org.apache.hc.core5.http.ParseException, se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException, IOException, URISyntaxException
      Constructs a SorterPlaylist from a url to a spotify song.
      Parameters:
      sapi - the se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi object with credentials that enable web API requests
      url - Spotify url to playlist
      Throws:
      org.apache.hc.core5.http.ParseException - If underlying service fails
      se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException - If an http error occurs int eh api request
      IOException - If api output fails to be read
      URISyntaxException - If URL is malformed

      Computes the emotions of each song in the playlist (time consuming process)
      Parameters:
      penv - The PythonEnvHandler to pass each song to machine learning model
      Throws:
      PythonError - If Python throws an error
      IOException - If reading/writing to CLI fails
      InterruptedException - If underlying Python script fails mid-execution

    • sort

      public void sort()
      Uses a nearest neighbour approach to "sort" the playlist and "solve" the travelling salesman problem via heuristic

      Does NOT chance the Spotify playlist via API
